alert.note: Alert for Bay (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 10:44AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BAY...SAGINAW... SHIAWASSEE AND WESTERN GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM EST... At 1043 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Merrill to 6 miles northwest of Elsie to near Portland. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flint, Saginaw, Owosso, Fenton, Flushing, Frankenmuth, Durand, Clio, Chesaning, Perry, St. Charles, Birch Run, Laingsburg, New Lothrop, Freeland, Burton, Swartz Creek, Linden, Corunna, and Mount Morris. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 112 and 156. I-475 between mile markers 11 and 16. I-675 between mile markers 1 and 7. I-69 between mile markers 98 and 136. US-23 between mile markers 78 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
